Question 31 
 
  
 
 
 
 
Mathematics
The bar graph shows the frequency of the number of wickets taken in a match by a bowler in her career. 
For example, in 17 of her matches, the bowler has taken 5 wickets each. The median number of wickets 
taken by the bowler in a match is __________ (rounded off to one decimal place).
